channel.title: Version 5.3 :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: 5.3.0 (2022-10-07) Change Change In the effort to comply with WCAG standards, the implementation of the collapsible menu was changed. The functionality of the new implementation does not work with old browsers (Internet Explorer 11). New New Image formatting has two new classes to align images to the left or right. Additionally, the already existing inline option is now documented.
